Modifier functions allow you to add formatting and apply evaluations to wildcards within a binding, or within a response email, print template or PDF. For example, you can use formatting functions to format a list of values, convert a value to upper case or format a date. The evaluation functions are typically used when writing conditional statements within bindings.
Email sent to the person who submits a form.
Sed id tempus ligula, a congue turpis.
